comment:
* A class representing the media metadata information defined in the Basic Audio Profile.
 *
 * @hide

variables.name: CREATOR
variables.comment:
* A {@link Parcelable.Creator} to create {@link BluetoothLeAudioContentMetadata} from parcel.
     *
     * @hide

methods.name: public String getProgramInfo()
methods.comment:
* Get the title and/or summary of Audio Stream content in UTF-8 format.
     *
     * @return title and/or summary of Audio Stream content in UTF-8 format, null if this metadata
     *     does not exist
     * @hide

methods.name: public String getLanguage()
methods.comment:
* Get language of the audio stream in 3-byte, lower case language code as defined in ISO 639-3.
     *
     * @return ISO 639-3 formatted language code, null if this metadata does not exist
     * @hide

methods.name: public byte[] getRawMetadata()
methods.comment: * Get the raw bytes of stream metadata in Bluetooth LTV format as defined in the Generic Audio * section of Bluetooth * Assigned Numbers, including metadata that was not covered by the getter methods in this * class * * @return raw bytes of stream metadata in Bluetooth LTV format

methods.name: public void writeToParcel(Parcel out, int flags)
public static BluetoothLeAudioContentMetadata fromRawBytes(@NonNull byte[] rawBytes)
methods.comment:
* Construct a {@link BluetoothLeAudioContentMetadata} from raw bytes. * *

The byte array will be parsed and values for each getter will be populated * *

Raw metadata cannot be set using builder in order to maintain raw bytes and getter value * consistency * * @param rawBytes raw bytes of stream metadata in Bluetooth LTV format * @return parsed {@link BluetoothLeAudioContentMetadata} object * @throws IllegalArgumentException if rawBytes is null or when the raw bytes cannot * be parsed to build the object * @hide

methodNames: public void writeToParcel(Parcel out, int flags)
public static BluetoothLeAudioContentMetadata fromRawBytes(@NonNull byte[] rawBytes)
